survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Mental Health Resources Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees about the effectiveness and accessibility of workplace mental health resources to improve support services.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the availability of mental health resources provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of analysis. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How would you rate the availability of mental health resources provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following mental health resources have you used in the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Consider adding an 'Other' option if additional resources are offered.

script.question_text: Which of the following mental health resources have you used in the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How comfortable do you feel discussing mental health concerns with your manager or HR?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure anonymity to encourage honest responses.

script.question_text: How comfortable do you feel discussing mental health concerns with your manager or HR?

questions.question_text: What additional mental health resources or support would you like to see offered at your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Keep the text box concise but allow for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional mental health resources or support would you like to see offered at your workplace?

questions.question_text: Has your employer's mental health support positively impacted your work performance or well-being?
answer_options: No, but I haven't used the resources
No, it has had a negative impact
questions.routing_logic: Appears if respondent selected any option other than 'None of the above' in Q2.
questions.client_notes: Use a mix of positive and neutral options to avoid bias. Ensure the question is skipped if respondent hasn't used any resources.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice (radio buttons). Apply skip logic based on Q2.

script.question_text: Has your employer's mental health support positively impacted your work performance or well-being?
answer_options: No, but I haven't used the resources
No, it has had a negative impact
script.routing_logic: Appears if respondent selected any option other than 'None of the above' in Q2.
